directions: Place the olive oil, vinegar, yellow mustard, Dijon mustard, and honey into a screw top jar. Seal, and shake to blend the salad dressing. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Scatter the beet, celery root, carrot, and apple in layers onto individual salad plates. Drizzle with dressing to serve.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, or to taste
1 small celery root (celeriac), peeled and grated
1 small Macintosh apple - peeled, cored, and cubed (optional)
title: Winter Market Salad
